attributes.action: Objection to build house on Fentons Wood, Wilkinson Drive, Kesgrave, Ipswich IP5 2DS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Hon. Prime Minister MP.,
 
Could you please give some attention about this issue and please help us as much you can.This issue is an important issue and good for our community.  

    I would like to put an objection to build house on Fenton's wood land, off Wilkinson drive, Kesgrave, Grange farm, Ipswich IP5 2DS .  These woodland and land are very good for public walk, healthy environment for birds and all wild life. The land near by woodland will be use full for cederwood primary school extensions in future. Please consider the future for our children, local community and preserve the natural resource as well. 

 

I am looking forward to heare good feed back.

 


With kindest regards,

Suresh Suviseshamuthu

House No: 39 Wilkinson Drive .
Kesgrave, Ipswich IP5 2DS.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
